result.reason: IntegratedProgram closes the connection when the launcher process (wsltty) exits, even if the actual terminal window (mintty) is still running.
result.approach: Update IntegratedProgram to track the process owning the captured window. If it differs from the launched process, monitor the window-owning process for exit.
